newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Sri Lanka confirms 100,000T wheat purchase.
newsitem.headline: Sri Lanka confirms 100,000T wheat purchase.

text.p: The Sri Lankan government's grain purchasing arm, the Cooperative Wholesale Establishment (CWE), on Monday confirmed it had purchased 100,000 tonnes of wheat.

The CWE said it bought 50,000 tonnes of Australian hard wheat at US$191.95 a tonne C&F for May 27 - June 5 shipment and 50,000 tonnes of Canadian western red spring wheat at $189.42 a tonne C&F for June 16-25 shipment.
